events.text: Let's review the additional settings of the post that you have chosen.
You have set the Location to be on. It would be better to turn it off on your post for better data privacy.
You have set the visibility option to be seen by everyone! This can be dangerous and can be a comrpomise for your data privacy.
You have set the visibility option to be seen by Friends of Friends. This is better than everyone seeing your data.
You might also want to consider sharing this to your Friends only.
